$HYPE is showing a clear bearish continuation on the 15-minute chart. Price rejected strongly from the 21.70‚Äì21.80 zone and printed a sharp sell-off, confirming sellers are still in control. The recent bounce attempt was weak and immediately sold into, which usually signals distribution rather than a trend reversal.

Price is now trading below the previous support area, turning it into resistance. As long as HYPE stays below the 21.60‚Äì21.80 zone, downside continuation remains likely. A clean reclaim and hold above resistance would invalidate this short idea, but until then, pressure stays to the downside.

Scalp Trade Plan
Short
Entry Zone: 21.45 ‚Äì 21.80
TP1: 21.10
TP2: 20.70
Stop Loss: 22.05
Leverage: 20x ‚Äì 50x
Margin: 1% ‚Äì 3%
Risk Tip: Book partial profit at TP1 and move stop-loss to entry to protect capital.

üö® $HYPE  has clearly rolled over here.  A head and shoulders has played out, support failed, and that shift flipped the structure decisively bearish. Since the breakdown, price has kept printing lower lows, which confirms the weakness rather than a fakeout.  The next level that really matters is around $19. That‚Äôs the last meaningful support on the chart. If it doesn‚Äôt hold, downside risk opens up quickly and a move toward the $12 area comes into play. Ôªø#Altcoin Season#  #HYPE  #Macro Insights#

üìä #Hyperliquid  ‚Äì Downside Cycle  $HYPE  remains in a short‚Äëterm downtrend from the 1/6 peak, unfolding in 3 waves lower.  Price is now entering the equal legs target area at $21.59 ‚Äì $20.34, which can trigger an initial bounce.  If that bounce fails, more downside can open toward the next extreme area at $18.3, before another recovery attempt takes place.  #Crypto  #Altcoins  #Trading  #ElliottWave

The truth about building in crypto üßµ

10 years ago 99% of crypto activity was people creating, holding, and trading tokens

Today 99% of crypto activity is people creating, holding, and trading tokens

In 10 years 99% of crypto activity will be people creating, holding, and trading tokens

It's okay to be honest with ourselves that DeSo, InfoFi, GameFi, read write own, and everything else has failed

People make up all sorts of compelling narratives but it is indisputable that the underlying activity is the same as 10 years ago

If you are a builder I highly recommend focusing on wallets, launchpads, exchanges, or infrastructure that supports wallets, launchpads, and exchanges (like bridges, onramps, etc.)

The Solana, Base, and Hyperliquid ecosystems have all realized this and are trippling down on becoming the global decentralized exchange for everything

There is a massive opportunity to help build out the infrastructure to bring all assets on-chain as well as the app layer that will connect 8 billion people to the world of token trading

It has never been a more exciting time to build in crypto but don't make the mistake of building something that nobody wants!

üîª $HYPE   shows bearish continuation after a range-bound phase.  The price has been consolidating after the broke below and is now facing downward pressure within a downward channel.   üìâ Technical View: ‚Ä¢ Pattern: Wedge pattern with compression phase ‚Ä¢ Bias: Bearish, expect further downside momentum ‚Ä¢ Key Level: Watch the support line around $21.00 and resistance near $25.00  ‚úÖFull analytics in telegram->   https://t.me/gainmuse    ‚ö†Ô∏è If the price breaks and closes above the resistance line at $30.00, this bearish scenario could be invalidated.  #HYPE  #Hyperliquid  #HYPE price analysis#

The more people are shilling a token, the more you should consider taking profits.

I remember how half of my timeline was bull posting $HYPE when it was at $50. Now that it's at $21, I barely see anyone talking about it on CT.

It's interesting how market psychology works.
